subject: Football
Heisman Trophy
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Colt Brennan, Hawaii’s star quarterback, is projected to make a run at the Heisman Trophy, which is noteworthy considering the improbable, circuitous road that Brennan took to Hawaii.
snippet: Colt Brennan, Hawaii’s star quarterback, is projected to make a run at the Heisman Trophy, which is noteworthy considering the improbable, circuitous road that Brennan took to Hawaii.
